DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Deviation Action Reason Not Done Supplemental Qualifiers Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the protocol deviations domain for why no action was taken.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Deviation Action Not-Done Reason Protocol Deviations Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)_A thing done._The explanation given as to why an action was not completed._A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the protocol deviations domain.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unintended departure from the study plan which has not been prospectively reviewed and approved by the IRB and FDA.

Concepts.definition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)
